name: Green Poison
description: Green Poison is a dangerously flavorful indica cross championed by Sweet Seeds. It pulls you in with a fruity and floral aroma, then delivers a potent dose of euphoria and body-numbing relaxation. Don’t be fooled by the lethal name: the only thing Green Poison kills is pain, insomnia, muscle spasms, and appetite loss. Growers should bear in mind that Green Poison is particularly susceptible to fungi, but those up to the challenge will want to wait 7 weeks for this indica to finish flowering indoors or near the end of September outside.
descriptionPlain: Green Poison is a dangerously flavorful indica cross championed by Sweet Seeds. It pulls you in with a fruity and floral aroma, then delivers a potent dose of euphoria and body-numbing relaxation. Don’t be fooled by the lethal name: the only thing Green Poison kills is pain, insomnia, muscle spasms, and appetite loss. Growers should bear in mind that Green Poison is particularly susceptible to fungi, but those up to the challenge will want to wait 7 weeks for this indica to finish flowering indoors or near the end of September outside.

highlightedReviews.text: I recently picked up a healthy portion of Green Poison. I was initially drawn to its sweet citrusy and subtle earthy/piney aroma. Its buds are dense but light, with a generous dusting of sticky trichomes that leaves your finger tips smelling of freshly peeled oranges. You don't want to consume it because it is smells so amazing and looks so beautiful... But then you break down! You bust it up, and light it ablaze! Its smoke is mildly thick, but pungent! My initial reaction of the high was that it was a little on the light side for my tastes, which disappointed me slightly. However, within a few minutes my disappointment was replaced with cerebral euphoria and the munchies! It definitely is on the clear side, I never find myself feeling foggy or forgetful, in fact, quite the opposite. The euphoric effects usually dissipate within a few hours leaving you feel extremely relaxed. This is definitely a strain that everyone can enjoy, however, beginners should be aware of its late onset effects. I would recommend this strain to everyone
Just made me feel really relaxed and calm then sleepy great for amnesia I find

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Big Bang, Frisian Dew, Green Poison, Jamaican Lion, and Purple Gorilla
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Ask and you shall receive, good people of Leafly. Elected by you, this week's new strains include Big Bang, Frisian Dew, Green Poison, Jamaican Lion, and Purple Gorilla. Read more about each variety below, and if you've come across any of these newcomers in your own strain hunting, enlighten us with a strain review. Keep the tips coming!
   1. Big Bang
Characteristics of Big Bang:

80% indica
Cross between Skunk, Northern Lights, and El Niño
Breeder: Green House Seeds
Apple, rose, and violet aroma
Possesses sedating, calming, and stress-relieving qualities
May help with pain, sleeplessness, and anxiety
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 9 weeks

   2. Frisian Dew
Characteristics of Frisian Dew:

50/50 hybrid
Cross between Super Skunk and Purple Star
Breeder: Dutch Passion
Spicy, pine, and citrus aroma
Delivers powerfully euphoric effects and full-body relaxation
Indoor flowering time of 7 to 8 weeks

   3. Green Poison
Characteristics of Green Poison:

70% indica
Breeder: Sweet Seeds
Fruity, floral aroma
Brings body numbness and cerebral euphoria
May help with pain, insomnia, muscle spasms, and appetite loss
Indoor flowering time of 7 weeks

   4. Jamaican Lion
Characteristics of Jamaican Lion:

High-CBD sativa strain
Breeder: Shadrock
Sweet herbal aroma
Delivers mildly psychoactive effects as well as elevated sensory perception, focus, and creativity
May help with pain, anxiety, and inflammation
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 9 weeks

   5. Purple Gorilla
Characteristics of Purple Gorilla:

60% indica-dominant hybrid
Grape, cherry, and citrus aroma
Has relaxing, "couch-lock" effects
May help with pain, insomnia, migraines, and muscles spasms
Indoor flowering time of 7 to 8 weeks
